Name: Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 2
About the game: Play the sequel to the solitaire game based on Edgar Allan Poe's famous mystical poem, The Raven. A work that perfectly reflects Edgar's inner world, his life and creativity. Mystical, dark and extraordinary! Pass all 200 levels in 20 locations and get a lot of unusual trophies. A large number of levels will allow you to enjoy the game for several hours every day! Unique game balance and complexity of levels will allow you to enjoy the game and strain your mind. - Levels that are interesting to unravel - Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards! - Colorful graphics and theme music - the perfect solitaire game! - Pick cards faster, thanks to the joker - increase the multiplier combo, which will give you more coins! - Get 15 mystical rewards! - Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
